		Answer:
answer: Tony Romo is a former American football quarterback who played in the National Football League (NFL) for 14 seasons, primarily with the Dallas Cowboys. He was a four-time Pro Bowl selection and led the Cowboys to the playoffs four times, including an appearance in the NFC Divisional Championship Game in 2007. Romo retired from the NFL in 2017 and currently works as a sports commentator for CBS Sports.
